TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content:
hmm... lemme see....

1. davekat is best ship

2. sans is boring

3. weeaboo

4. CoD is better than battlefield

On 9/15/2014 at 4:10 PM, GreeningGalaxy said:

"I skipped straight to Act 5 because I wanted to meet the Trolls first. The first four acts aren't that important, are they?"

oooooohh it's onnnn
Han shot first!
JarJar is the BEST character in the WHOLE franchise....
Are Vocaloids Japanese cartoon singers?
MINECRAFT DOESN'T EVEN HAVE GOOD GRAPHICS...

Let's see. Some of these may be slightly hammed up for 'better effect':

- See all those nifty features KSP has right now? I'm pretty sure they would be just what you wanted if SQUAD just copied the exact mod they took the idea from, instead of making their own half assed version of it.

- If Mechjeb is cheating, let's see you do all those nifty missions IVA only, cause controlling the craft from the outside is also cheating.

- So, let me get this straight. PewDiePie makes millions of dollars per year doing essentially nothing and you think he has the right to complain about anything?

- You know that the fanbase of <insert modern cartoon here> still stands mostly because of the huge amount of porn material made behind the curtains, right?

- Game of Thrones? Isn't that thing where people are either backstabbing each other, having sex with each other and/or killing each other?

-Doctor Who?

1 hour ago, BloodDusk said:

If Mechjeb is cheating, let's see you do all those nifty missions IVA only, cause controlling the craft from the outside is also cheating.

That's actually true.

Earth is round.

We landed on the moon.

Space travel is possible.

The Illuminati don't exist.

Rap is not music.

Beats headphones are stupid looking.

Bill Gates looks like he got hit by a bus.

Xbox is for people who don't know how to use a computer.

Real programmers use EMACS.

Real programmers use VIM.

Real programmers use Gedit.  (No, they don't)

You don't need ∆v readings, anyway.

Unity is a bad game engine (it isn't)

Steve Jobs deserved to die. (He didn't)

Pitbull?  You got a new dog?

I like rovers/spaceplanes/rockets/boats/submarines.(say one, offend the others)

I like the old aero system. 

The fairings are perfectly good right now.

The drifting mechanics will turn KSP into need for speed.

Why is PewDiePie so popular, he just shouts at his screen and swears. (true for me)

Star Wars VII is a copy of Star Wars IV!

Robocraft is becoming FTD right now! 

Candy Crush is sooo boring, you just have to combine 3 pieces of candy. (true for me)

3 hours ago, ZentroCatson said:

Star Wars VII is a copy of Star Wars IV!

Even though that's true, I still liked Episode VII.

 

-There's nothing to do in KSP.
Terraria is a Minecraft ripoff.

Papyrus was your moms corpse

What is Undertale and I heard it is stoopid

Politics 

Sure to create flamewar wherever it goes.

Edited February 16, 2016 by Sanic

Tumblr is a place for the socially illiterate (Says someone with an active tumblr account )

To facebook: Twitter.

To every other social media site: Facebook.

FNaF isn't scary.

 

Playstation/Xbox/Wii U is for n00bs.

 

Vine sucks.

"Why should we go to space when we haven't even finished exploring the oceans?"

"We shouldn't go to space before we've solved all our problems here on Earth."
Feline leukemia.

"Minecraft is a game for inmature 5-Year old noobs"

"Console players are scrubs, the PC master race is superior to them!"

Edited February 24, 2016 by DolphinDude3
Star Citizen has failed to deliver the "best damn space game"
Katniss Everdeen is just a wimpy whiny little crybaby
"insert undertale spoiler here"
"Vine memes are stupid. Actually, scratch that, Vine is stupid. 6 seconds isn't talent!" -me every day at school

"Russian Bias isn't a thing. You idiots just need to learn how to play." (War Thunder)

"Kerbal Space Program wouldn't be fun at all if it was realistic." (KSP, duh)

"X-Plane is superior in every way to Flight Simulator X."

"NASA's funding is too high."

"Defeating Sans in Genocide is easy as heck, unless you're autistic."

"IL-2 1946 has crap graphics"

"What's the point of IL-2 if you have the superior-in-every-way War Thunder?"
